subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: The American sprinter Justin Gatlin will not be able to defend his gold medal at the Beijing Olympics after a four-year ban for doping was upheld by the Court of Arbitration for Sport.
snippet: The American sprinter Justin Gatlin will not be able to defend his gold medal at the Beijing Olympics after a four-year ban for doping was upheld by the Court of Arbitration for Sport.
